TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TreeNodeBindingCollection extends System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection
Public NotInheritable Class TreeNodeBindingCollection Inherits StateManagedCollection
public ref class TreeNodeBindingCollection sealed : System::Web::UI::StateManagedCollection

summary.span: 表示 控制項中 物件的集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of objects in the control.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 類別用來儲存和管理的集合中的物件控制項。The class is used to store and manage a collection of objects in the control. 控制使用類別適用於其屬性。The control uses the class for its property. 屬性包含物件，定義資料項目及它所繫結的節點之間的關聯性。The property contains objects that define the relationship between a data item and the node that it is binding to. 當繫結至資料來源，其中每個資料項目都包含多個屬性 （例如 XML 項目具有多個屬性），節點會顯示所傳回的值`ToString`資料項目的 預設的方法。When binding to a data source where each data item contains multiple properties (such as an XML element with several attributes), a node displays the value that is returned by the `ToString` method of the data item, by default. 在 XML 項目，該節點會顯示項目名稱，顯示的樹狀結構的基礎結構，但沒有很有用。In the case of an XML element, the node displays the element name, which shows the underlying structure of the tree but is not very useful otherwise. 您可以藉由指定樹狀節點繫結，節點繫結至特定的資料屬性。You can bind a node to a specific data item property by specifying tree node bindings. 雖然以程式設計方式填入集合，則通常會以宣告方式設定。Although the collection can be programmatically populated, it is usually set declaratively. 若要設定樹狀節點繫結以宣告方式：To set the tree node bindings declaratively: 1. 巢狀開啟和關閉``標記的開頭和結尾標記之間控制項。Nest opening and closing `` tags between the opening and closing tags of the control. 2. 位置``開頭和結尾之間的項目``標記您想要指定每個樹狀結構節點繫結。Place `` elements between the opening and closing `` tags for each tree node binding that you want to specify. 您可以透過程式設計方式管理透過加入和移除物件。You can programmatically manage a by adding and removing objects. 若要加入物件加入至集合，使用或方法。To add a object to the collection, use the or method. 若要從集合中移除節點，使用， ，或方法。To remove nodes from the collection, use the , , or method. 類別支援數種方式來存取集合中的項目：The class supports several ways to access the items in the collection: - 使用索引子來擷取直接在特定的以零為起始索引位置的物件。Use the indexer to retrieve a object directly at a specific zero-based index. - 使用方法，以建立可用來逐一查看集合的列舉值。Use the method to create an enumerator that can be used to iterate through the collection. ## Examples 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。This section contains two code examples. 第一個程式碼範例示範如何以填入物件以宣告方式。The first code example demonstrates how to populate a object declaratively. 第二個程式碼範例示範如何以填入物件以程式設計的方式。The second code example demonstrates how to populate a object programmatically. 下列程式碼範例示範如何以填入物件以宣告方式。The following code example demonstrates how to populate a object declaratively. 針對此範例正常運作，您必須複製所在的檔案，稱為 Book.xml 本節結尾的 XML 資料。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the XML data that is located at the end of this section to a file called Book.xml. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeViewXml#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewXml/CS/treeviewxmlcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeViewXml#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewXml/VB/treeviewxmlvb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何以填入物件以程式設計的方式。The following code example demonstrates how to populate a object programmatically. 針對此範例正常運作，您必須複製所在的檔案，稱為 Book.xml 本節結尾的範例 XML 資料。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data that is located at the end of this section to a file called Book.xml. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeViewCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewCtor/CS/treeviewctorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeViewCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewCtor/VB/treeviewctorvb.aspx#1)] 以下是上述程式碼範例的 XML 資料。The following is the XML data for the preceding code examples. ```
```

remarks.format:
## Remarks 使用方法，將附加指定物件的結尾物件。Use the method to append the specified object to the end of the object. 或者，您可以插入物件存放至在特定的索引，使用方法。As an alternative, you can insert a object in the at a specific index using the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法，將新以程式設計方式為物件物件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to add a new object programmatically to a object. 針對此範例正常運作，您必須複製所在的檔案，稱為 Book.xml 本節結尾的 XML 資料。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the XML data that is located at the end of this section to a file called Book.xml. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法，以判斷是否物件包含在物件。Use the method to determine whether a object is contained in the object. 這個方法通常用來測試是否存在之前執行的工作，例如加入或移除物件從集合。This method is commonly used to test for the existence of a object before performing a task, such as adding or removing a from the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法，將複製的內容物件插入`bindingArray`。Use the method to copy the contents of the object into `bindingArray`. 開始複製的項目`index`。Items are copied starting at `index`. 您接著可以使用陣列來存取集合中的項目。You can then use the array to access the items that are in the collection. 或者，您可以使用方法來建立列舉值，可以用來存取集合中的項目。As an alternative, you can use the method to create an enumerator that can be used to access the items in the collection. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法，將複製的內容集合到陣列。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to copy the contents of the collection to an array. ## Remarks 使用索引子存取物件從物件位於`i`使用陣列標記法。Use the indexer to access a object from the object located at `i` using array notation. 索引子可讓您修改或取代直接在集合中的物件。The indexer allows you to modify or replace a object in the collection directly. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用索引子存取中的項目物件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the indexer to access the items that are in a object. 物件的第三層節點以程式設計方式更新新值。The object for the third-level nodes is updated programmatically with new values. 針對此範例正常運作，您必須複製所在的檔案，稱為 Book.xml 本節結尾的 XML 資料。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the XML data that is located at the end of this section to a file called Book.xml. .method public hidebysig instance void Remove(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding binding) cil managed

span.span: The to remove.

summary.span: 從 物件移除指定的 物件。

span.span: Removes the specified object from the object.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 使用方法中移除指定集合中的物件。Use the method to remove the specified object from the collection. 然後遵循該節點的所有項目都會往上移，以填滿空的位置。All items that follow that node are then moved up to fill the vacant position. 移動項目的索引也會更新。The indexes of the moved items are also updated. 或者，您可以移除位於指定索引使用的節點方法。As an alternative, you can remove a node at a specific index using the method. 您也可以移除每個節點，在集合中使用方法。You can also remove every node in the collection using the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法移除物件以程式設計方式從物件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to remove a object programmatically from a object. 針對此範例正常運作，您必須複製所在的檔案，稱為 Book.xml 本節結尾的 XML 資料。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the XML data that is located at the end of this section to a file called Book.xml. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeNodeBindingCollectionAdd#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeNodeBindingCollectionAdd/CS/treenodebindingcollectionaddcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeNodeBindingCollectionAdd#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeNodeBindingCollectionAdd/VB/treenodebindingcollectionaddvb.aspx#1)] 以下是上述程式碼範例的 XML 資料。The following is the XML data for the preceding code example. ```
```

remarks.format:
## Remarks 使用方法移除物件位於`index`從物件。Use the method to remove the object located at `index` from a object. 然後遵循該節點的所有項目都會往上移，以填滿空的位置。All items that follow that node are then moved up to fill the vacant position. 移動項目的索引也會更新。The indexes of the moved items are also updated. 或者，您可以移除特定物件使用方法。As an alternative, you can remove a specific object by using the method. 您也可以移除集合中的每個節點，使用方法。You can also remove every node in the collection by using the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法移除物件以程式設計方式從物件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to remove a object programmatically from a object. 針對此範例正常運作，您必須複製所在的檔案，稱為 Book.xml 本節結尾的 XML 資料。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the XML data that is located at the end of this section to a file called Book.xml.
